name: sendwise-batch-transfers
description: Smart Batch Transfers for ETH & ERC20 Tokens - Farcaster Mini App

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html js styles .well-known package.json vercel.json public/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.vercel-build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html js styles .well-known package.json vercel.json public/ 2>/dev/null || true

author: Sendwise Team
